meanings: a small size, a pocket size

vlive.korean: [빈약한 세트장과 조촐한 제작진...] 지금 소형 카메라를 켰는데요. [On a small set with a small crew...] I just turned on a small camera. 듣기 View video 셀럽티비(Celuv.TV) : [셀럽티비/개취뷰티] 화이트데이를 준비하는 자세!
vlive.english: [On a small set with a small crew...] I just turned on a small camera.

vlive.english: Big company and small company aren't very different.
